sentences.english: The new pavilion old sad, tearful eyes, drizzly rain more wine.
sentences.chinese: 故國傷心，新亭淚眼，更酒瀟瀟雨。

sentences.english: Looking at the sculpture "Rose", I suddenly think of the old work, "Motherland".
sentences.chinese: 看着雕塑《玫瑰》，忽然有些懷念《故國》的舊作了。

sentences.english: Don't ask the pedestrians, to the east country flow.
sentences.chinese: 行人莫問當年事，故國東來渭水流。

sentences.english: Shangyang village is a place with rice culture in the south of the Yangzi.
sentences.chinese: “防風故國”的上楊村，是江南稻作文化區。

sentences.english: The mountains and rivers, hometown of heart, also like Wang de lou.
sentences.chinese: 故國山川，故園心眼，還似王粲登樓。

sentences.english: The dream around the border town, heart fly old building.
sentences.chinese: 夢繞邊城月，心飛故國樓。

sentences.english: Just off the beautiful Dhang E, ushered in the birthday of the motherland.
sentences.chinese: 剛剛送走了美麗的嫦娥，又迎來了故國的華誕。

sentences.english: Homeland dream return, sleep for weeping and crying.
sentences.chinese: 故國夢重歸，覺來雙淚垂。

sentences.english: The same heart, think again of motherland.
sentences.chinese: 心裏思潮起伏，又想到故國了。

definition: Guanshan or Kuanshan town in Taitung County 臺東縣|台东县[Tai2 dong1 Xian4], southeast Taiwan
fortresses and mountains (along the Great Wall)/one's hometown
to fall and wither (like autumn leaves)/(fig.) drifting and homeless
to visit places famous for their scenery
